title: Epson EX7240 Pro | Take the Tour of the WXGA 3LCD Portable Projector
description:
The EX7240 Pro wireless projector projects HD-quality presentations and video from laptops, smartphones, tablets and streaming devices.

For more information, visit: http://bit.ly/2pzngXj
